channel.title: Create A Report on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Create A Report on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Using the Report Builder
item.description: DefectDojo allows you to create Custom Reports for external audiences, which summarize the Findings or Endpoints that you wish to report on.

item.title: Templates and Historical Reports
item.description: Once you have created one or more Reports in DefectDojo you can take further actions, including: Using a report as a template for subsequent reports
